They can be conjured by the monster-only spell [[Grand Avatar]]. Their ranged attack is an irresistible barrage of energy (2d10) that never misses. ==History== *Grand avatars were removed along with the spell in [[0.17]]. *Grand avatars were added in [[0.14]].
